helpdesk_ticket.description:
Giving feedback should strengthen relationships-not strain them. Yet many
professionals avoid difficult conversations, fearing conflict, emotional
reactions, or misunderstandings. When feedback is not delivered well,
performance issues linger, teamwork breaks down, and trust erodes.

 

This practical and highly interactive course equips you with the confidence
and skills to deliver constructive feedback and criticism clearly,
tactfully, and professionally. You'll learn how to prepare and structure
your message, choose the right moment, manage emotions (yours and theirs),
and communicate in a way that encourages growth rather than defensiveness.
From mastering the Feedback Sandwich and SMART goal-setting to handling
anger, tension, and sensitive topics, you'll gain proven tools you can apply
immediately at work.

 

By the end of the course, you will be able to turn tough conversations into
productive, future-focused discussions that build trust, improve
performance, and strengthen team relationships.

 

 

Choose Your Preferred Learning Mode!


Course Title

Delivering Constructive Feedback and Criticisms Effectively and Tactfully


In-Person Learning @ Hotel

HRP Code: AV9046

Date: 06 Jan 2026 (Tue)

Time: 9am to 5pm

Venue: Holiday Inn Atrium (Halal)/ Holiday Inn Orchard City Centre/ Concorde
Hotel


Virtual Learning

HRP Code: AV1140

Date: 11 May 2026 (Mon)

Time: 9.30am to 4.30pm

Venue: at the comfort of your home via Zoom


Course Fees

$680 (subject to prevailing GST) 


Contact

Ms. Calista (Tel: 6720 3333; Whatsapp: 8040 9568; Email:
training.aventis@gmail.com)


Registration 

Simply email following details to training.aventis@gmail.com

 

Bill To:

Email:

Phone/Mobile:

 

 

Course Outlines

Module 1: Preparing and Planning

Gathering facts and creating action plan

Practicing your tone

Keeping written records

 

Module 2: Choosing a Time and Place

Checking the ego at the door

Criticising in private and praising in public

Creating a safe atmosphere

 

Module 3: During the Session

The Feedback Sandwich

Monitoring body language

Active listening skills

 

Module 4: Setting Goals

SMART Goals

The Three Ps

Asking for inputs and being specific

 

Module 5: Diffuse Anger or Negative Emotions

Choosing the correct words

Staying on topic

Empathising and Avoiding "You" messages

 

Module 6: After the Session

Follow-up meetings

Providing support and resources

Focusing on the future

notes.body: Hello Jyoti,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     We understand you wish to permanently delete your account with PharmEasy. We would be unable to delete the account from our database. We have to produce/show any or all transactions or interactions, past or present, when asked for by relevant governmental authorities.      Please note that once the account is deactivated, we are unable to process any requests or reactivate the account.     Once your request has been processed in the system, our agent will call within 24 to 48 hours on a registered mobile number and confirm if you have requested account deactivation. After verification, an OTP will be sent to your registered mobile number.  Once the OTP is verified, the agent will go ahead and deactivate your account       Kindly confirm so that we can proceed with the request.     Awaiting your earliest response.     Regards,  Habiba
notes.body_html:

Please note that once the account is deactivated, we are unable to process any requests or reactivate the account.

Once your request has been processed in the system, our agent will call within 24 to 48 hours on a registered mobile number and confirm if you have requested account deactivation. After verification, an OTP will be sent to your registered mobile number.  Once the OTP is verified, the agent will go ahead and deactivate your account  

Kindly confirm so that we can proceed with the request.

Awaiting your earliest response.

notes.body: Hello Mithlesh,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     This email is with regards to your order #652646288500006912-38403, we apologize for the inconvenience caused to you with your order.     As per update received from our team, please be informed that we have raised a return request for 01 quantity of the DR. MOREPEN GLUCO ONE BLOOD GLUCOSE TEST STRIP | BG-03 | 50 NO'S   on 05th December 2025. Please be informed, items being returned should be in their original manufacturer’s packaging with labels and barcode intact.     Please note that the medicine will be collected within 48 hours from the day the request is raised. Once the medicine is returned, it will be verified by our partner retailer at the store. The refund will be processed and initiated within 5 business days. Also, once the refund is initiated it would reflect in your original source within 7-10 buisness days.     We appreciate your patience in the meantime.     We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.     For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.     Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!     Regards,  PharmEasy
notes.body_html:
Hello Mithlesh,

Greetings from PharmEasy!
 
This email is with regards to your order #652646288500006912-38403, we apologize for the inconvenience caused to you with your order.

As per update received from our team, please be informed that we have raised a return request for 01 quantity of the DR. MOREPEN GLUCO ONE BLOOD GLUCOSE TEST STRIP | BG-03 | 50 NO'S   on 05th December 2025. Please be informed, items being returned should be in their original manufacturer’s packaging with labels and barcode intact.
 
Please note that the medicine will be collected within 48 hours from the day the request is raised. Once the medicine is returned, it will be verified by our partner retailer at the store. The refund will be processed and initiated within 5 business days. Also, once the refund is initiated it would reflect in your original source within 7-10 buisness days.
 
We appreciate your patience in the meantime.
 
We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.
 
For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.
 
Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!
 
Regards,
PharmEasy

notes.body: Hello Ashlyn,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     We understand you wish to permanently delete your account with PharmEasy. We would be unable to delete the account from our database. We have to produce/show any or all transactions or interactions, past or present, when asked for by relevant governmental authorities.      Please note that once the account is deactivated, we are unable to process any requests or reactivate the account.     Once your request has been processed in the system, our agent will call within 24 to 48 hours on a registered mobile number and confirm if you have requested account deactivation. After verification, an OTP will be sent to your registered mobile number.  Once the OTP is verified, the agent will go ahead and deactivate your account       Kindly confirm so that we can proceed with the request.     Awaiting your earliest response.     Regards,  Habiba
notes.body_html:
Hello Ashlyn,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

We understand you wish to permanently delete your account with PharmEasy. We would be unable to delete the account from our database. We have to produce/show any or all transactions or interactions, past or present, when asked for by relevant governmental authorities. 

Please note that once the account is deactivated, we are unable to process any requests or reactivate the account.

Once your request has been processed in the system, our agent will call within 24 to 48 hours on a registered mobile number and confirm if you have requested account deactivation. After verification, an OTP will be sent to your registered mobile number.  Once the OTP is verified, the agent will go ahead and deactivate your account  

Kindly confirm so that we can proceed with the request.

Awaiting your earliest response.

Regards,
Habiba

helpdesk_ticket.description_html:
Performance Leadership Mastery/p>
 

SMART Goals, Coaching & Team Alignment
Stepping into a team leader role requires a shift from personal achievement to enabling collective success. This workshop empowers new and emerging leaders to navigate that transition with confidence by mastering SMART goal-setting, aligning individual performance with team vision and strengthening communication across the team. Through practical frameworks and leadership-coaching techniques, participants learn how to craft clear expectations, monitor progress using meaningful KPIs and address performance gaps in a constructive, collaborative way. By blending clarity, motivation and accountability, this programme equips leaders with the mindset and tools to elevate team performance and drive sustainable results

Learning Outcomes

By the end of the workshop, you will be equipped with following skills:
  • Align Performance Indicators with Business Goals: Effectively align key people performance indicators with strategic business objectives to drive organizational success.
  • Develop Key Performance Metrics: Propose relevant and actionable key performance metrics that accurately reflect individual and team contributions.
  • Evaluate Performance Against KPIs: Assess and analyze employee performance against established KPIs, identifying strengths and areas for improvement.
  • Identify Root Causes of Performance Gaps: Analyze individual and organizational performance gaps to determine underlying root causes, enabling targeted interventions.
  • Design Learning and Development Initiatives: Recommend tailored learning and development initiatives to address performance gaps and adapt to changes in the business environment, while also suggesting improvements to organization-wide performance management processes and tracking systems.

Course Details
 
Course Title: Managing People Performance Effectively the SMART Way
Course Fees: SGD 1,280.00 (excluding GST)
Eligible NTUC members can claim up to 50% off total course fees via UTAP Funding after course completion!
 
For enquiries, please contact Ms Calista at Whatsapp: 8040 9568 │ Call: 6720 3333 ┃ Email: training.aventis@gmail.com
 
 

Classroom Session

HRP Code: AV3010

Date: 29 & 30 Dec 2025 (Mon & Tue)
Time: 9.00 am to 5.00 pm
Venue: Holiday Inn Orchard City Centre/ Concorde Hotel
Don't Miss Out on our December Special: 10% OFF when you register with a buddy — plus 50% UTAP funding!
🍽️ Buffet lunch and refreshments included for all participants
Register for Classroom Session
 
 

Course Outline
DAY 1:
Module 1: Linkage between business processes and business strategies
  • Your role as a Boss / Manager / Leader / Supervisor in relation to the learning & development of your team
  • Discovering your leadership style, and how it influences the way you lead your team
  • Translate business strategies into business processes for your team and determine KPIs for success
Module 2: Work requirements, performance standards & performance indicator
  • Crafting your team vision, and ensuring it includes the aspirations of your team members
  • Having the initial 1 on 1 conversation with each team member to turn the team vision into reality through KPIs and goals setting
  • Prepare a SMART individual development plan (IDP) to achieve the goals set for each team member, while allowing them to achieve their own personal and professional aspirations
Module 3: Measures to enhance the effectiveness and efficiency of tracking & monitoring performances
  • The importance of trust in relationships to track and monitor the team’s performances
  • Insights into the components of effectively delegate of work to ensure achievement of agreed performances
  • Routinely refer to the achievement of the team vision as a way of inspiring and sustainably motivating the team towards agreed performance levels
DAY 2:
Module 4: Causes that result in the presence of individual &/ business performance gaps
  • Tuckman’s team development model and the adaptation of your leadership style
  • Having 1 on 1 conversations to determine root causes of individual and / or business performance gaps
  • Assess and measure actual individual performance against agreed business performance levels, with a plan for improvement
  • Module 5: External learning and developmental practices and emerging industry trends
  • Helping the team learn on the job by giving positive and negative feedback
  • In conjunction with feedback, how can one be a leader coach by utilizing the GROW coaching model to ensure ongoing personal and professional development
  • Inspiring positive change to enhance team resilience and adaptability during changes to the business environment

helpdesk_ticket.subject: Inquiry for Micro Fulfillment / Dark Store Partnership
helpdesk_ticket.description_html:
Hi Team,
My name is Tanay, and I’m interested in partnering with PharmEasy as a micro-fulfillment / dark-store operator in the Sion–Mumbai region.
I currently don’t have a warehouse space, but I am ready to acquire a suitable property immediately if your team confirms that this model is open for new partners in Mumbai.
Could you please share:
  • Whether PharmEasy currently operates this model through franchise/partner-owned dark stores
  • Requirements for space (sq ft, layout, specifications)
  • Commercial terms and expected monthly volumes
  • Partner onboarding process
I’m highly interested and can move quickly once I receive your guidance.
Thanks & regards,
Tanay

Hello Rinku,

Hello Rinku,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

This email is in regard to order #652583868065492992-93885.

As per the update received, as an exception, we have raised a return request for the item delivered to you against the item FYTIKA FIT LIVER | 60 TABLETS - quantity - 1. Your patience is highly appreciated in the meantime.

For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels on the app or website listed in the "Need Help" section.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Safe.

Regards, PharmEasy

Hello Nitish,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

This email is in regard to order #654043863927226368-16391.

Pursuant to your conversation with the executive, an investigation was conducted and found that all items were properly packed and dispatched under the order. Hence, we are unable to provide a refund or to dispatch the items again. Your understanding is highly appreciated in this regard.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Safe.

PharmEasy

Hi Team,

Upon reviewing the details, we found that a doctor consultation call was
arranged because the prescription for FOLITRAX 7.5MG (Strip of 10 Tablets)
was older than 18 months. As per protocol, a fresh prescription dated
within the last 18 months is required.

The doctor had done multiple attempts to contact the customer however the
calls were consistently unreachable.
Since the doctor followed the required process and made multiple attempts,
Due to this, the doctor was unable to process the order.. Later the doctor
rejected the order as "Refused consultation"
without customer consent which is completely incorrect.

We will share the necessary feedback with the doctor to ensure the process
is followed consistently and to avoid any future misunderstandings.

Hi Team,

Upon reviewing the details, we found that a doctor consultation call was arranged because the prescription for FOLITRAX 7.5MG (Strip of 10 Tablets) was older than 18 months. As per protocol, a fresh prescription dated within the last 18 months is required.

The doctor had done multiple attempts to contact the customer however the calls were consistently unreachable.
Since the doctor followed the required process and made multiple attempts, Due to this, the doctor was unable to process the order.. Later the doctor rejected the order as "Refused consultation"
without customer consent which is completely incorrect.

We will share the necessary feedback with the doctor to ensure the process is followed consistently and to avoid any future misunderstandings.

Kindly confirm what has happened in this order in detail.

Hi Team,

Yes the doctor had made multiple attempts to Delivery  the number 8291218571 not the registered number  8291383753.

Since the doctor had not tried calling on an alternate number and rejected the order without customer consent..

We have taken necessary action against the doctor to avoid this discrepancy in future.

On Thu, Dec 4, 2025 at 7:12 PM Alisha Abhang <alisha.abhang@aarman.in> wrote:
Hi Team,

Upon reviewing the details, we found that a doctor consultation call was arranged because the prescription for FOLITRAX 7.5MG (Strip of 10 Tablets) was older than 18 months. As per protocol, a fresh prescription dated within the last 18 months is required.

The doctor had done multiple attempts to contact the customer however the calls were consistently unreachable.
Since the doctor followed the required process and made multiple attempts, Due to this, the doctor was unable to process the order.. Later the doctor rejected the order as "Refused consultation"
without customer consent which is completely incorrect.

We will share the necessary feedback with the doctor to ensure the process is followed consistently and to avoid any future misunderstandings.

On Thu, Dec 4, 2025 at 5:57 PM Grievance Officer <grievance-officer@pharmeasy.in> wrote:
Order #655229393197072384-98500
 
1. Please confirm the reason for the Teleconsultation.

2. Cx had contacted the Cx care yesterday and today and had requested a callback on the registered number 8291383753. Was the request received?



3. Why was the order cancelled? Cx says he did not receive any calls.

Kindly confirm what has happened in this order in detail.


Regards,
Grievance Helpdesk

notes.body: Hello Vishal Kumar,    Greetings from PharmEasy!     This email is with regards to your order #654116210105384960-32773, as checked your order was canceled on 04th December, 2025. Due to some unforeseen circumstances, the order was not delivered to you by the expected date of delivery. We apologize for the inconvenience caused to you with your order.     We would like to inform you that cancellation refund of Rs.1547.26/- initiated on 04th December, 2025. The refund  will refunded  payments source within 05-07 business days.     We would request you to place a new order and we will ensure the order is delivered to you on priority.     Be rest assured as I have jotted down the details of your experience and PharmEasy will ensure all appropriate actions are taken to prevent similar situations from happening in the future. Looking forward to delighting you soon.     For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.      Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!     Regards,  PharmEasy
notes.body_html:
Hello Vishal Kumar,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

This email is with regards to your order #654116210105384960-32773, as checked your order was canceled on 04th December, 2025. Due to some unforeseen circumstances, the order was not delivered to you by the expected date of delivery. We apologize for the inconvenience caused to you with your order.

We would like to inform you that cancellation refund of Rs.1547.26/- initiated on 04th December, 2025. The refund  will refunded  payments source within 05-07 business days.

We would request you to place a new order and we will ensure the order is delivered to you on priority.

Be rest assured as I have jotted down the details of your experience and PharmEasy will ensure all appropriate actions are taken to prevent similar situations from happening in the future. Looking forward to delighting you soon.

For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section. 

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!

Regards,
PharmEasy

helpdesk_ticket.description:
Hi Officer,
I have tried raising tickets but nothing happened, I hope something will
happen after this email. Otherwise I lost hope in Pharmeasy and this might
be my last order if this does not get resolved.
Please take strict action against this delivery agent, he never called to
deliver the order marked that Consignee refused the delivery.
Could you please check why he is doing that? I am waiting for order to be
delivered and there is more and more delay, this is not acceptable at all,
please look into this matter urgently.
It is really ridiculous that it has been more than 8 days since the
medicines came to the nearest hub and they are not trying to deliver.
Are you guys taking any action on it if you are not able to deliver the
orders please don’t take the orders this is not at all acceptable.
Order Details: 650478819805552640-52678-OAW
*Tracking number: 9148880892301*

I am traveling abroad now, so I'm not able to call.
Please call on +91 9764539758

Thanks
Nanabhau Mahadik

--

Today, your technician Mahesh S Ballary collected my sample at 10:00 AM, well before the assigned slot of 10:30 AM–11:30 AM.

However, even after collecting the sample, he did NOT update the sample collection status in the PharmEasy app and gave the excuse of “server is low.”



Due to this failure, your system has now sent me a message saying my appointment is rescheduled, even though the sample is already taken.

This is completely unacceptable, and it puts the integrity of my test at risk.



This situation clearly shows:



? Failure to scan and log my sample barcode

? Incorrect appointment status even after sample collection

? No real-time update from the technician

? High risk of report delay or rejection

? Operational failure covered up by saying “server is low”



Your customer care has only verbally confirmed that the sample is collected, but your system still shows a wrong reschedule status, which means:



⚠️ My sample might not be logged in the lab

⚠️ The report may not start processing on time

⚠️ The sample can get delayed or rejected due to improper barcode syncing

⚠️ There is no official confirmation of collection in the app



I am demanding the following immediately:



1️⃣ Manually update my order status to “Sample Collected.”

2️⃣ Confirm that my sample has been scanned, logged, and sent to the lab.

3️⃣ Verify barcode registration and provide proof.

4️⃣ Ensure my report TAT remains as per the original schedule.

5️⃣ Take strict action against the technician for not updating the collection in the app.



Please treat this as a high-priority escalation and provide a written confirmation of the above, as this issue directly affects my diagnostic report and health.





Dr Akshata Valandikar 


--

notes.body:
Dear PharmEasy Team,



This is to confirm that the sample collection status for my order 6226021 has now been updated to “Collection Done.” Thank you for addressing this.



However, the report availability time is still reflecting the rescheduled 8–9 PM slot, even though the sample was actually collected much earlier today.

This incorrect timing may delay the report processing and create unnecessary confusion.



I request you to immediately update the report ETA as per the actual collection time and ensure that your backend records reflect the correct sequence of events.



Please treat this as urgent and confirm once the correction is made.



Regards,

Akshata





Dr Akshata Valandikar 


>

notes.body: Hello akshata,   Greetings from PharmEasy!    We are sorry to know that our phebotomist unable to complete the data entry in the application. We aim to provide the best service, however, situations like these are rare.   We would like to inform you that your sample was collected at 10:00 AM. Due to a technical issue with the app, the data entry was completed later . Please be assured that the sample was collected and dispatched on time, and the barcode and vial were scanned and uploaded correctly. We will sensitize the phlebotomist regarding this, and your reports remain accurate and authentic. We apologize for the inconvenience.  For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.   Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!  Regards,  Litu Behera  PharmEasy
notes.body_html:
Hello akshata,

Greetings from PharmEasy!  

We are sorry to know that our phebotomist unable to complete the data entry in the application. We aim to provide the best service, however, situations like these are rare. 

We would like to inform you that your sample was collected at 10:00 AM. Due to a technical issue with the app, the data entry was completed later . Please be assured that the sample was collected and dispatched on time, and the barcode and vial were scanned and uploaded correctly.
We will sensitize the phlebotomist regarding this, and your reports remain accurate and authentic. We apologize for the inconvenience.

For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section. 

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!

Regards,
Litu Behera 
PharmEasy

2️⃣ Confirm that my sample has been scanned, logged, and sent to the lab.
3️⃣ Verify barcode registration and provide proof.
4️⃣ Ensure my report TAT remains as per the original schedule.
5️⃣ Take strict action against the technician for not updating the collection in the app.

Please treat this as a high-priority escalation and provide a written confirmation of the above, as this issue directly affects my diagnostic report and health.



Dr Akshata Valandikar
